spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent overall room placement and wall alignment. Door orientations are largely correct. Points deducted for the omission of the small 'Closet' balcony area behind the kitchen and inaccurate window placement in Rachel's bedroom (plan shows window on the bottom-facing wall, render places it on the side).

structural_fidelity.notes: Model follows the floating dark-background constraint perfectly. No floor plan text leaked into the 3D model. One room (the balcony/external closet) is missing from the top-left corner of the layout.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture scale is highly consistent. Most fixtures (kitchen counters, beds, dining table) are accurately mapped. Minor deduction for the living room sofa configuration which varies slightly from the blueprint's layout.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect adherence to style constraints. Low-poly geometry, flat shading, soft ambient lighting, and an accurate 45-degree isometric orthographic camera angle.

detected_errors.description: Missing the 'Closet' balcony area indicated on the top-left of the floor plan.
Window in Rachel's bedroom (bottom-left) is placed on the external side wall instead of the bottom wall as shown in the blueprint.
